data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix dahurica (Dahurican larch) from sample BALYRILA-92

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Granit, Tree line 900 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 10%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 2%, Moss cover 100%, Vegatation type: Offener LADA-Wald mit Flechten, Film number: 1070A
